tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Deebak was referred to me by my son in law. When I met him for the first time, I was very comfortable explaining to him about my pain and discomfort. His approach to the medication and the follow up was very impressive. My pain reduced by almost 50% within a week with medication and physiotherapy. Now I am on some exercises and hopefully this will give me some more comfort. One good thing I noticed with the team was they send you reminder messages on your next appointment which is very useful. I would sincerely recommend Dr. Deebak for any ortho issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. Deebak was recommended by my aunt. I first consulted him for my Shoulder, neck and elbow pain. He listened patiently, which I think is important, asked relevant questions and gave a brief explanation. He prescribed medication and exercises...., impressing upon me the importance of the latter. I am completely pain free and stopped exercising. However, when I went for the review I was told by him to continue recommended exercises if I desired better quality of life.  The choice is mine.  Not only is the clinic clean, Dr. Deebak and his staff are friendly and efficient.

review: Dr Deebak is very friendly *** **** ****** *** will address our problem patiently . He cares for us and never fails to make sure the problem is rectified . I have consulted Dr Deebak for my son who is 6 years and had flat foot and growing  pain on his feet . Dr Deebak had also done a major surgery for my grandfather who is 87 years old for a  very serious fracture . He took care of him so well and was very kind . Dr Deebak  cured my mother from spondylitis, she used to have severe pain and he simply rectified it with simple medicines , exercise and physio therapy . He is an amazing person with respect to Ortho complains and I will double vouch for this man . He is simply sweet and superb!! Thank you sir for everything .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
******* *** ****** ***** ** *** **** ***** ********* **** **** ***** ** *** ****** *** ** ** ***** I got injury & got treatment in top-tier hospital, then at my 2nd consultation (after 15 days) they preferred to go for surgery as it didn't  workout. I was even advised by 6 other doctors (after consultation with 2nd xray) that I need to opt for surgery. But I didn't want that to happen to me.

After that, Dr. Deepak sir gave me full hope to go with POP treatment and to give another try.  He tied the POP himself to all the patients which we couldn't see nowadays with other doctors. Especially all nurses were very friendly & gave lot of instructions on treatment.

After my 45 days completed, it was cured as quick by nature & I m happy to c my legs with ankle strip bracelets now.
Till I have a big hope that I will b walking soon only by his treatment... üëçüèªüëçüèª
